org.thethingsnetwork.data.common.messages

Class UplinkMessage

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.thethingsnetwork.data.common.messages.UplinkMessage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DataMessage

    public class UplinkMessage
extends Object
implements DataMessage
    This is a wrapper class for JSONObject to provide support for base64 encoded payload
    Author:
    Romain Cambier
